channel.title: Flutter, Linux, Install on S4NKALP
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter, Linux, Install on S4NKALP

item.title: Install Flutter in Linux without Android Studio
item.description: INSTALL FLUTTER WITHOUT ANDROID STUDIO ON LINUX sudo pacman -S jdk17-openjdk sudo pacman -S git cd ~/ mkdir Android cd Android mkdir cmdline-tools Download Flutter Go to the folder where you downloaded the zip file and unzip the file. You can unzip it by right click on the file and click on extract here or using the terminal by the following code unzip flutter_linux_3.3.10-stable.tar.xz Now move the “flutter” folder to the “Home/Android/” directory
